name: One Bullet (MrBiimo)
description:
Submission for the GMTK JAM 2019 

Theme: Only One

Game :One Bullet 

In this game you have only one bullet that you need to pick up after using it in the middle of a horde of monsters .

IMPORTANT !!! : The Game play using a game pad .

This Jam was super fun to work , and as usual per jam , lacked the time to finish many things ,HUD , some enemies bugs and some features that i wanted to add .

Hope you enjoy it anyway
